name: Mixpanel
description: Mixpanel is an advanced analytics service that helps improve web and mobile applications by tracking how users interact & engage with them. Mixpanel’s mission is to help the world learn from their data, by offering a sophisticated analytics platform that companies can use to understand how users behave. Mixpanel performs all of their data analysis in real-time.

apis.name: Mixpanel
apis.description: Mixpanel is the most advanced analytics platform in the world for mobile & web.
web analytics, real time web analytics, web stats, web statistics, blog stats, blog statistics business intelligence
